page.title: 20GLENURQUHART HIGHLAND GAMES
page.content: The annual{Highland Games}take place on the last Saturday of August on the local sports field.It is a highlight of the village year. In the morning the locals participate in athletics and{heavy events}such as tossing the caber,throwing the 561b weight over the bar and the hammer.In the afternoon there are open events such as cycling,dancing,piping and more athletics including the road race from Inverness to{Drumnadrochit},and the hill race up Achmony Hill. Besides all this exercise there are also lots of{Amusments}eg. chair-o- planes, dodgems and mini-motorbikes and lots of'win a prize'stalls.The Games attract visitors from all over the world as well as locals and former residents,who make a special trip back for the day.In the evening there is a {Dance}held in the village hall.
